sentences.sentence: Oropharyngeal and dental infections can also cause cervical adenopathy.
sentences.translation: 口咽炎及牙部感染同样导致颈部腺病。

sentences.sentence: Patients were able to retain or rapidly regain oropharyngeal function in the majority of cases.
sentences.translation: 大部分患者能够很快的恢复口咽部的功能。

sentences.sentence: The coincidence of bacteria culture was very high (98.91%) in the sputum and secretion of oropharyngeal.
sentences.translation: 病人痰培养细菌和口咽部分泌物细菌符合率高达98。 91%。
